model.player

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the player's Resources, which are: Weapons, Ammunition and PowerUps
    Author:
    Michele Leva, Stefano Martino, Marco Maria Ferrara
